LuaFunctionCreator
EditorWindow
public
LuaFunctionCreator

An editor window that allows the user to create a new Lua API accessible function.

Variables
functionName
private string functionName
Functions
ShowWindow
[MenuItem("Tools/ Create LUA API Function")]
public static void ShowWindow()

Opens the LuaFunctionCreator window.

OnGUI
private void OnGUI()

Renders the editor window's GUI and handles user input.

CreatePartialClassFile
private void CreatePartialClassFile()

Creates a new partial class file for the Lua function with the given name.

OpenPartialClassFile
private void OpenPartialClassFile()

Opens the created partial class file for the user to write their implementation.

Variables
template
string template

A string containing the C# code template for the Lua function partial class file.
